medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms of syncope were recurrent and occurred during exertion. After catheter ablation for atrial flutter, he developed symptoms including atrial standstill, prolonged QRS duration, and high-degree atrioventricular block.
medical_history.past_medical_history: A missense mutation in SCN5A (c.3823G>A) resulting in p.D1275N, previously reported in a Dutch family with related symptoms. No significant past medical history was mentioned.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's mother and one son share the mutation but have no clinical findings.
